full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## IM365 Information Management System Modernization Project

**Title (English/French):**  
IM365 Information Management System Modernization Project  
Projet de modernisation du système de gestion de l'information IM365

**Reference Number:**  
PW-23-01027085  

**Procurement Overview:**  
Environment and Climate Change Canada is seeking various informatics professional services to support the IM365 information management system modernization project and related initiatives. This requirement is open to TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified in Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region.

**Services Required:**  
Bidders must submit a bid for all resource categories. Only one (1) resource per category and level will be evaluated as part of this bid solicitation. The contractor must identify each resource by name and submit a current resume for each proposed resource.

**Contract Duration:**  
The contract period will be for one (1) year from the date of contract with an irrevocable option to extend it for up to one (1) additional one-year period.

**Security Requirements:**  
Security Clearance for Common PS SRCL #06 and Reliability letter for each resource are required.

**Evaluation Criteria:**  
Only one (1) ressource per category and level will be evaluated as part of this bid solicitation. Additional Resources will only be assessed after contract award once specific tasks are requested of the Contractor.

**Eligible Suppliers and Categories:**  
Only the following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal: 1511995 Ontario Inc. (Tundra Technical Solutions); 4165047 Canada Inc. (Innovision Consulting Inc.); Alivaktuk Consulting Inc. & NavPoint Consulting Group Inc. (joint venture); BBG Management Corporation; Calian Ltd.; Cofomo Ottawa; Contract Community Inc.); Coradix technology Consulting Ltd.; Makwa Resourcing Inc. (TPG Technology Consulting Ltd. joint venture); Nortak Software Ltd.; Prolity Corporation; Quallium Corporation; S.I. SYSTEMS ULC; and Turtle Technologies Inc. The specified resource categories and levels include I5 Information Management Architect; I10 Technical Architect; I11 Technology Architect; B1 Business Analyst; B9 Courseware Developer; and P9 Project Manager.

**Tender Closing Date and Time:**  
2023-05-12T14:00:00
**Important Notice:**  
The request for proposal has expired. However, the relevant information is still available for interested parties
